attributes.additional_details:
I would like it made law that all job vacancies have to be advertised through Job Centre’s and JobCenterPlus, as if the Government is serious about getting people back to work, and not all people are online, then this would be of benefit to all job seekers. Having to scour job agency websites and company websites continually makes looking for a job a full time job in itself.
This simple law change would benefit businesses and people of the UK, matching the right people to the right vacancies.

rejection.details: How an employer choses to advertise is a commercial matter
